message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product, and I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm asking for $15000 for it. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, and I see you're interested in the product.  While $12000 is my minimum,  I'm willing to come down to $13000 to make this deal happen. This price reflects the value I know you'll get from the product. What do you say?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I was thinking of $12500. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
